name: Cat on the Table
description:
Push things off, pour the drinks... Try to ruin everything on the table!

You can click the arrow on the homepage to switch the display language, for those who cannot read as a cat.

Use the downloadable instead of the H5 version for better sound experience. 

Music -  by everybody-loves Johann Strauss Jr.. 

Some pixel arts - downloaded from GDevelop asset store. 

Everything else - by me.
